name: coding-interview-platform
description: Online coding interview platform with real-time collaboration

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:tests"
scripts.dev:tests: echo '\nâœ… Servers starting... Run tests with: cd tests && npm test\n'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../tests && npm install
